QuestData.Title: Pop Quiz: Advanced Rune Drawing
QuestData.Description: Still aching to get into the headmistress' study, eh? I suppose I can let you in... as long as you prove that you've been studying.$b$bProper rune formation is essential when it comes to spellcasting. If you can draw a rune, you can cast a spell.$b$bI will provide outlines for you. You can simply use your feet to trace the runes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Trace an arcane rune, a fire rune, and a frost rune.
QuestData.CompletionText: Go on, then! Get those feet moving!
QuestData.RewardText: Exemplary work, young $n. With runes like these, you'll be graduating in no time.
